targets.rawSql:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
concat(rshost,'_core' ),
sum(CONVERT(cpu_info -> '$.total', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) cpu_total
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(CONVERT(cpu_info -> '$.load', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) cpu_load
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(CONVERT(cpu_info -> '$.id', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) cpu_id
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(CONVERT(cpu_info -> '$.wa', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) cpu_wait
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(CONVERT(mem_info -> '$.total', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) mem_total
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(CONVERT(mem_info -> '$.used', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) mem_used
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(CONVERT(mem_info -> '$.free', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) mem_free
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
concat(rshost,":",part) part,
sum(CONVERT(disk_info -> '$.total', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) disk_total
from tb_monitor_disk_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
concat(rshost,":",part) part,
sum(CONVERT(disk_info -> '$.used', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) disk_used
from tb_monitor_disk_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
concat(rshost,":",part) part,
sum(CONVERT(disk_info -> '$.free', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) disk_free
from tb_monitor_disk_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(json_unquote(io_info -> '$.Total.write')) disk_write
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(json_unquote(io_info -> '$.Total.read')) disk_read
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
concat(rshost,":",dev) part,
sum(avgqu) disk_avgqu
from tb_monitor_disk_util_qu_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
concat(rshost,":",dev) part,
sum(util) disk_util
from tb_monitor_disk_util_qu_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
concat(rshost,'_core' ),
sum(CONVERT(net -> '$.speed', UNSIGNED INTEGER) ) net_total
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(json_unquote(net -> '$.Total')) net_Total
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(json_unquote(net -> '$.send')) net_send
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
rshost,
sum(json_unquote(net -> '$.receive')) net_receive
from tb_monitor_host_info
where rshost = '$host' and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.a_time) AS "time",
  concat(t1.rshost,':',t1.rsport,' ',t2.remarks) AS metric,
  sum(t1.cpu) 
FROM tb_monitor_process_io_info t1 join tb_monitor_process_info t2 on t1.md5_str = t2.md5_str
where t1.rshost = '$host' and t1.cpu > 20 and $__timeFilter(t1.a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.a_time)

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.a_time) AS "time",
  concat(t1.rshost,':',t1.rsport,' ',t2.remarks) AS metric,
  sum(t1.mem) 
FROM tb_monitor_process_io_info t1 join tb_monitor_process_info t2 on t1.md5_str = t2.md5_str
where t1.rshost = '$host' and t1.mem > 5 and $__timeFilter(t1.a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.a_time)

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.a_time) AS "time",
  concat(t1.rshost,':',t1.rsport,' ',t2.remarks) AS metric,
  sum(t1.io_r) 
FROM tb_monitor_process_io_info t1 join tb_monitor_process_info t2 on t1.md5_str = t2.md5_str
where t1.rshost = '$host' and t1.io_r > 10240 and $__timeFilter(t1.a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.a_time)

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.a_time) AS "time",
  concat(t1.rshost,':',t1.rsport,' ',t2.remarks) AS metric,
  sum(t1.io_w) 
FROM tb_monitor_process_io_info t1 join tb_monitor_process_info t2 on t1.md5_str = t2.md5_str
where t1.rshost = '$host' and t1.io_w > 10240 and $__timeFilter(t1.a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(t1.a_time)

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
  concat(rsinfo,'_',remote) AS metric,
  sum(in_info) 
FROM tb_monitor_port_net_info
where rsinfo like '$host%' and in_info > 10240 and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time) AS "time",
  concat(rsinfo,'_',remote) AS metric,
  sum(out_info) 
FROM tb_monitor_port_net_info
where rsinfo like '$host%' and out_info > 10240 and $__timeFilter(a_time)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a_time)

list.definition: select rshost from tb_monitor_host_info group by rshost;
list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: select rshost from tb_monitor_host_info group by rshost;
